djvdj 0.0.0.9000

Add V(D)J data to Seurat object

import_vdj.Rd

Add V(D)J data to Seurat object

import_vdj(
  sobj_in,
  vdj_dir,
  prefix = "",
  cell_prefix = "",
  filter_contigs = TRUE,
  sep = ";"
)

Arguments

sobj_in

Seurat object
vdj_dir

cellranger vdj output directory
prefix

Prefix to add to new meta.data columns
cell_prefix

Prefix to add to cell barcodes
filter_contigs

Only include chains with at least one productive contig
sep

Separator to use for storing per cell clonotype information in the meta.data

Value

Seurat object with V(D)J data added to meta.data

Contents

Developed by Ryan Sheridan.
